document_data.name: Horrid Mire
document_data.mainbody: The '''Horrid Mire''' was one of the three swamps that composed the [[dark fey enclave]], a region of the [[Feywild]] that was corrupted by a coven of [[fomorian]] witches and their [[dark fey]] minions.

Geography.Geographical Features: The mire earned its name from the clouds of toxic swamp gas that permeated the air above its murky waters. The foul clouds and the dark pools of water were the direct result of the alchemical experimentation of the fomorian coven of witches.

document_data.History:
''Circa'' the {{YearlinkName|1479}}, a number of [[Iliyanbruen]] elves of [[New Sharandar]] became trapped in the Horrid Mire, during the conflict that arose between their people and the army of [[Malabog]].

[[Kehl Skywatcher]] worked with some adventurers from [[Neverwinter]] to rescue her fellow elves. She concocted a [[dispersal agent|unique potion]] that could actually reverse the putrid clouds permeating the swamp, as well as undo with the effects they had on the trapped elves.
